title: Google\Cloud\Tasks\V2beta3\OidcToken
name: OidcToken
description:
Contains information needed for generating an OpenID Connect token.

This type of authorization can be used for many scenarios, including calling Cloud Run, or endpoints where you intend to validate the token yourself.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.tasks.v2beta3.OidcToken

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.service_account_email
params.description: Service account email to be used for generating OIDC token. The service account must be within the same project as the queue. The caller must have iam.serviceAccounts.actAs permission for the service account.

params.name: data.audience
params.description: Audience to be used when generating OIDC token. If not specified, the URI specified in target will be used.

methods.name: getServiceAccountEmail
methods.description:
Service account email to be used for generating OIDC token.

The service account must be within the same project as the queue. The caller must have iam.serviceAccounts.actAs permission for the service account.
